resources.string: Your one stop solution to Day to Day worries at IIIT

myIIIT app helps students of International Institute of Information Technology, Hyderabad keep track of their meals and attendance. This app works on any network so users do not need to login into IIIT network

This app is NOT an official app by International Institute Of Information Technology, Hyderabad. Developers take no responsibility of the data shown and fetched from different services. Your credentials are stored ONLY on your local device and may be transmitted over network for various purposes
